title: Disaster or Masterstroke: Should Tadej Poga훾ar Rip Up the Script and Race Paris-Roubaix in 2025?
content:
Faceoff: Jim Cotton and Andrew Hood argue the potential and pitfalls of Poga훾ar rewriting his 2025 race program and braving the 'Hell of the North.'

Read the full article at Disaster or Masterstroke: Should Tadej Poga훾ar Rip Up the Script and Race Paris-Roubaix in 2025? on Velo.
